title: Filter redo tomorrow to exclude completed revisions

requirements.text: Modify the redo tomorrow functionality to only reschedule revision numbers that are not marked as completed in the reviewStatuses array

quotes: In redo tomorrow option if I click it should only consider which is not marked
If I mark it has completed it shouldn't consider for redo schedule

acceptanceCriteria: When redo tomorrow is clicked, only unmarked revisions (reviewStatuses[i] = false) are rescheduled
Revisions marked as completed (reviewStatuses[i] = true) are not included in the new schedule
The reviewStatuses array is preserved for the rescheduled revisions
Completed revision statuses remain unchanged after rescheduling

requirements.text: Update the frontend redo tomorrow button to reflect that only incomplete revisions will be rescheduled

quotes: In redo tomorrow option if I click it should only consider which is not marked

acceptanceCriteria: The redo tomorrow action correctly calls the backend with the filter logic
User understands that only unmarked revisions will be rescheduled
The UI reflects the updated schedule after the redo operation

constraints: Preserve the existing reviewStatuses array structure in RevisionSchedule
Do not modify completed revision statuses during rescheduling
nonGoals: Modifying how revisions are marked as complete
Altering the calendar or topics view display logic
